scripts.compile:all: pnpm compile:common:fa2:all && pnpm compile:core:fa2:all && pnpm compile:core:hook:all
scripts.compile:common:fa2:all: pnpm compile:common:fa2 && pnpm compile:common:fa2:using-consts && pnpm compile:common:fa2:transfer-hook && pnpm compile:common:fa2:transfer-hook:using-consts
scripts.compile:common:fa2: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/common/fa2/main.ligo -e fa2_main --file-constants ./build/constants/all.json > ./build/contracts/common/fa2.tz
scripts.compile:common:fa2:using-consts: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/common/fa2/main-using-constants.ligo -e fa2_main_using_constants --file-constants ./build/constants/all.json > ./build/contracts/common/fa2-using-constants.tz
scripts.compile:common:fa2:transfer-hook: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/common/fa2/main.ligo -e fa2_main_transfer_with_hook --file-constants ./build/constants/all.json > ./build/contracts/common/fa2-transfer-hook.tz
scripts.compile:core:fa2: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/core-protocol/fa2/main.ligo -e fa2_plus_main --file-constants ./build/constants/all.json > ./build/contracts/core-protocol/fa2.tz
scripts.compile:swap-recipe-mint: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/main/swap-recipe-mint.ligo -e main --file-constants ./build/constants/all.json > ./build/contracts/swap-recipe-mint.tz
scripts.compile:core:hook:ntt: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/core-protocol/hooks/ntt/main.ligo -e main > ./build/contracts/core-protocol/hooks/ntt.tz
scripts.compile:const:fa2:json: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile expression --michelson-format json --init-file src/main/fa2.ligo pascaligo $(echo $CONST | tr '-' '_') > ./build/constants/fa2/${CONST}.json
scripts.compile:const:fa2:raw: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile constant --init-file src/main/fa2.ligo pascaligo $(echo $CONST | tr '-' '_')
scripts.compile:const:fa2-plus:json: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile expression --michelson-format json --init-file src/main/fa2-plus.ligo pascaligo $(echo $CONST | tr '-' '_') > ./build/constants/fa2-plus/${CONST}.json
scripts.compile:const:fa2-plus:raw: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile constant --init-file src/main/fa2-plus.ligo pascaligo $(echo $CONST | tr '-' '_')
